parties: Fasmila Raviraj,  NILET Vs National Institute of Language Education and Training and others -
judgement_by: Hon. M. Sampath K. B. Wijeratne J
keywords: Writ of certiorari,  mandamusand prohibition,  Academic and research officerat NILET,  Called for applications for two Director position from internal and external candidates,  Petitioner did not possess the required qualifications but claims ‘sufficiently qualified,  Laches,  Petitioner and the 5th Respondent both not qualified to be appointment to the post,  Writ of certiorari and prohibition issued against the 5th Respondent,  Writ of mandamus compelling the appointment of the Petitioner refused.
